verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> Praise יָ֨הּ ׀ <WH3050> ye the LORD הַ֭לְלוּ <WH1984> Praise עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> O ye servants יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD הַֽ֝לְלוּ <WH1984> praise אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD
יְהִ֤י <WH1961> become שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> be the name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD מְבֹרָ֑ךְ <WH1288> Blessed מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> from this time forth וְעַד־ <WH5704> and for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> evermore

מִמִּזְרַח־ <WH4217> From the rising שֶׁ֥מֶשׁ <WH8121> of the sun עַד־ <WH5704> to its מְבוֹא֑וֹ <WH3996> unto the going down מְ֝הֻלָּ֗ל <WH1984> [is] to be praised שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the same the LORD'S

רָ֖ם <WH7311> [is] high עַל־ <WH5921> above כָּל־ <WH3605> all גּוֹיִ֥ם ׀ <WH1471> above all nations יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> The LORD עַ֖ל <WH5921> is above הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> above the heavens כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <WH3519> [and] his glory
מִ֭י <WH4310> Who כַּיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Who [is] like unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> our God הַֽמַּגְבִּיהִ֥י <WH1361> on high לָשָֽׁבֶת׃ <WH3427> who dwelleth
הַֽמַּשְׁפִּילִ֥י <WH8213> Who humbleth לִרְא֑וֹת <WH7200> [himself] to behold בַּשָּׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> [the things that are] in heaven וּבָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> and in the earth
מְקִֽימִ֣י <WH6965> He raiseth up מֵעָפָ֣ר <WH6083> out of the dust דָּ֑ל <WH1800> the poor מֵֽ֝אַשְׁפֹּ֗ת <WH830> out of the dunghill יָרִ֥ים <WH7311> [and] lifteth אֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <WH34> the needy
לְהוֹשִׁיבִ֥י <WH3427> That he may set עִם־ <WH5973> with נְדִיבִ֑ים <WH5081> [him] with princes עִ֝֗ם <WH5973> With נְדִיבֵ֥י <WH5081> [even] with the princes עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> of his people

מֽוֹשִׁיבִ֨י ׀ <WH3427> to keep עֲקֶ֬רֶת <WH6135> He maketh the barren woman הַבַּ֗יִת <WH1004> house אֵֽם־ <WH517> mother הַבָּנִ֥ים <WH1121> of children שְׂמֵחָ֗ה <WH8056> [and to be] a joyful הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> ye the LORD
